name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Breaking Bad Rick and Morty Live Wallpaper

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Mix worlds with a Breaking Bad and Rick and Morty crossover live wallpaper, plus a search bar and quick-access icons

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Mix worlds with a Breaking Bad and Rick and Morty crossover live wallpaper, plus a search bar and quick-access icons.

Bring two iconic worlds together with the Breaking Bad x Rick and Morty Live Wallpaper Chrome extension! Every new tab unveils high-definition, animated scenes that fuse the gritty world of Breaking Bad with the zany multiverse of Rick and Morty. Ideal for fans of both shows, this extension captures the perfect blend of dark humor and wild science fiction, giving your browser a unique, memorable twist.

The extension includes a built-in Google search bar for efficient browsing and customizable quick-access icons, making your favorite sites just a click away. This mix of quirky visuals and practical features creates a browsing experience that is both entertaining and functional.

Perfect for fans who love crossovers and pop culture, the Breaking Bad x Rick and Morty Live Wallpaper extension brings each new tab to life with an unexpected twist.

Features:

Breaking Bad x Rick and Morty Live Wallpaper: Animated, high-definition scenes blending both universes.
Google Search Bar: Convenient, integrated search.
Customizable Quick-Access Icons: Personalize with links to favorite sites.
High-Quality Crossover Visuals: Fun, unique imagery from both shows.
Engaging and Functional: Combines pop culture flair with practical tools.
Perfect for Crossover Fans: Adds a memorable, fun touch to every tab.
